00043 class Painter;

00053 class Widget : public QWidget, public ThreadedLuaObject {
00054   Q_OBJECT
00055   Q_PROPERTY(QString class READ cssClass)
00056   Q_PROPERTY(float hue READ hue WRITE setHue)
00057 
00058 public:
00059   Widget(int window_flags = 0) :
00060     QWidget(NULL, (Qt::WindowFlags)window_flags) {
00061     setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose);
00062     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00063   }
00064 
00065   ~Widget() {
00066     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00067   }
00068 
00069   QString cssClass() const {
00070     return parent() ? QString("window") : QString("widget");
00071   }
00072 
00075   void setHue(float hue) {
00076     hue_ = hue;
00077     update();
00078   }
00079 
00080   float hue() {
00081     return hue_;
00082   }
00083 
00084   QSize size_hint_;
00085   // ============================================================ Dialog
00086   LuaStackSize getOpenFileName(const char *caption,
00087                           const char *base_dir,
00088                           const char *filter,
00089                           int options,
00090                           lua_State *L);
00091 
00092   LuaStackSize getExistingDirectory(const char *caption,
00093                           const char *base_dir,
00094                           int options,
00095                           lua_State *L);
00096 protected:
00097   virtual void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event);
00098 
00099   virtual void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00100     click(event, MousePress);
00101   }
00102 
00103   virtual void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00104     click(event, DoubleClick);
00105   }
00106 
00107   virtual void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00108     click(event, MouseRelease);
00109   }
00110 
00111   virtual void paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event);
00112   virtual void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event);
00113 
00114   virtual void moveEvent(QMoveEvent * event) {
00115     lua_State *L = lua_;
00116 
00117     if (!pushLuaCallback("moved")) return;
00118     lua_pushnumber(L, event->pos().x());
00119     lua_pushnumber(L, event->pos().y());
00120     // <func> <self> <x> <y>
00121     luaDump(L, "moved");
00122     int status = lua_pcall(L, 3, 0, 0);
00123 
00124     if (status) {
00125       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'moved' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00126     }
00127   }
00128 
00129   virtual void keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event) {
00130     keyboard(event, true);
00131   }
00132 
00133   virtual void keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *event) {
00134     keyboard(event, false);
00135   }
00136 
00137   virtual QSize sizeHint() const {
00138     return size_hint_;
00139   }
00140 
00143   float hue_;
00144 
00145 private:
00146   void paint(Painter &p);
00147   void keyboard(QKeyEvent *event, bool isPressed);
00148   void click(QMouseEvent *event, int type);
00149 };
